name: MUNDIAL MEMORIES
subject: Responsive website - Mobile application
description: For more than 50 years, World Cups were marked by characters and matches of legend. Mundial Memories travels the periods and redraw the great moments of history of the soccer through articles of archive and photos of times.

name: PANAM ALL STARZ
subject: Datavisualisation website
description: Panam All Starz is a student project realized by the third years of HETIC. It aims at comparing various rappers of the Ile-de-France under the shape of a datavisualisation. The site does not aim at determining what is the best rapper but to give data so that each is made his own idea.

name: TEDx CHAMPS-ÉLYSÉES EDUCATION
subject: Responsive website
description: TEDxChampsElyseesED is a conference TEDx completely dedicated to the education. Her first edition will take place on October 5th 2015. This conference will be completely dedicated to ideas, reflections or actions concerning the education.

name: KÉVIN CHAPRON
subject: Responsive website
description: Kévin Chapron is a young interactive developer freelance based in Paris and native of Brittany. Currently student at HETIC, he builds and codes with passion. Curious by nature, he is always observant and attentive to his surroundings.
